Test Name: Hereditary Hemorrhagic Telangiectasia and Vascular Malformations Gene Panel
Specimen Type: Whole blood (EDTA), buccal swab, tissue, or saliva
Purpose: To identify pathogenic variants in genes linked to hereditary hemorrhagic telangiectasia and vascular malformations.
Container: EDTA tube for blood; sterile collection devices for buccal swab, tissue, or saliva
Equipment: DNA extraction kit, PCR reagents, next-generation sequencing platform (e.g., Illumina MiSeq or Ion Torrent), gel electrophoresis apparatus, bioinformatics software
